ItemTooltips.blink: Helps you gank enemies, stun more enemies and escape if something goes wrong
ItemTooltips.mekansm: Heal you and your teammate. Help you to survive
ItemTooltips.force_staff: Help to escape or for more &quot;close meeting&quot; with your victim
ItemTooltips.dagon: Use Dagon with your ultimate skill and you will deal huge damage
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: More damage for your ultimate. Buy after dagon
ItemTooltips.refresher: You don't died?! How about one more time?
ItemTooltips.sphere: If your enemies are strong mages and stunners
ItemTooltips.invis_sword: Want for more sudden gank? Or maybe they use BKB? Also help you escape
ItemTooltips.veil_of_discord: You have hood of defiance?! I don't think so...
ItemTooltips.tranquil_boots: This artifact helps you to survive and will heal you after ganks
